base_description: Analyzing the topology, we find 5 nodes and 7 branches in this circuit. Regarding passive components, there are 6 resistive element(s). Energy is supplied through 1 current source(s). There are no controlled sources in this circuit. Measurement setup includes 1 voltage measurement(s). In total, this circuit comprises 7 circuit elements.

edits.instruction: Update resistance 3: change its value from 65立 to 13立.
Update DC current source 1: change its value from 60A to 12A.
Update resistive element 6: change its value from 24立 to 50立.
